body_html:
I guess maybe it will have a problem when we use the tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss.
I can't be sure that tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss will choose the labels can be add up to 1 in future.
Though tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss often is used to the word2vec, and In word2vec the tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss's label sum will be 1.

body:
I guess maybe it will have a problem when we use the tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss. 
I can't be sure that  tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss will choose the labels can be add up to 1 in future.
Though tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss often is used to the word2vec, and In word2vec the tf.nn.sampled_softmax_loss's label sum will be 1.
